title: The Evil at the Back of the Cave
description: Something had been living in the darkness for longer than anyone knew and now that unspeakable evil had been released into the land. Endreia, Firstwoman of Oen, must face the greatest challenge of her young life and possible the greatest in the history of Oen. With her husband Cody fighting his own battles, both from within and without, and the discovery of a sinister betrayal behind the scenes, she is forced to question everything she knows and trusts. Death is coming and unless the mystery of its root cause can be discovered and stopped, all hope for the land of Oen will be gone.
author: Timothy   James
